item.title: Johan
item.description: ![](/images/2012-04-02-johan/20120317-GKAR5112.JPG) On the first day of the portrait workshop, we had to take to take some photos of each other. Johan, a journalist and photographer (of course!), turned out to be a great model, too! ![](/images/2012-04-02-johan/20120317-GKAR5119.JPG)
